info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 4:25PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Rutherford, Polk and north central Spartanburg Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 424 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles north of Columbus, or 6 miles south of Lake Lure, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Rutherfordton, Lake Lure, Lake Bowen, Chimney Rock State Park, Mill Spring, Green Creek, Harris, Lake Adger and Fingerville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
